title: Pitch Sales Tech
description: A video-calling platform for trainee sales executives to train their sales pitching with live partners.

title: Tech TeamUp
description: Tech TeamUp is a collaboration and mentorship platform designed for aspiring software engineers to connect, form teams, and grow together. It brings the power of communication, organization, and learning into one unified space â€” helping developers gain real-world experience through teamwork and mentorship.

title: React Budget Tool
description: The React Budget Tool is a personal finance application that helps users track income and expenses, log daily spending, and meet saving goals. It provides an easy-to-use interface to visualize spending habits and keep your finances on track.

title: React BlackJack
description: A simple console-based Blackjack game built in React JS. Play against the computer, follow classic Blackjack rules, and practice your card strategy!
